void ldmx::EventFile::createRunMap (  )  [private]

Fill the internal map of run numbers to RunHeader objects from the input file.

Note:
This is called automatically the first time nextEvent() is activated. If there are no run headers in the input file (e.g. for a new simulation file) the run map will not be filled.
